title: Home
welcomeText:
# MEASA DeFi

Decentalized Finance Ecosystem for Middle East, Africa and South Asia Region.



# MEASA X

> We love people and businesses! And want to bridge the gap between traditional financial world and decentralized financial ecosystem 
>
> \- Muhammad Ahsan Khan, Founder MEASA DeFi.

### **Bringing MEASA X!** 

Individual users can buy and sell cryptocurrencies using banks and cards.

Business users can receive payments for services/goods in cryptocurrencies and may ask us to settle with fiat money into bank accounts or kept in cryptocurrencies.

Subcribe us for the Wait List to get timely updates.
